verses.text: \w Behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w shortened|strong="H7114"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w it|strong="H3068"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w ear|strong="H0241"\w* \w heavy|strong="H3513"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w it|strong="H3068"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H8085"\w* \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w divided|strong="H0914"\w* \w between|strong="H0996"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w your|strong="H8085"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w your|strong="H8085"\w* \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w hid|strong="H5641"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H0518"\w* \w not|strong="H0518"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* \w are|strong="H8193"\w* \w defiled|strong="H1351"\w* \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, \w and|strong="H1818"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w fingers|strong="H0676"\w* \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*: \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* \w have|strong="H5771"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w lies|strong="H8267"\w*, \w and|strong="H1818"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* uttereth \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*.

\w There|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w none|strong="H0369"\w* \w that|strong="H7121"\w* calleth \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w justice|strong="H6664"\w*, \w neither|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w any|strong="H0369"\w* \w one|strong="H0369"\w* \w that|strong="H7121"\w* judgeth truly: \w but|strong="H0369"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3205"\w* mere \w nothing|strong="H0369"\w*, \w and|strong="H2029"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* vanities: \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w conceived|strong="H2029"\w* labour, \w and|strong="H2029"\w* \w brought|strong="H3205"\w* \w forth|strong="H3205"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w*.

\w They|strong="H0398"\w* \w have|strong="H0398"\w* \w broken|strong="H1234"\w* \w the|strong="H0398"\w* \w eggs|strong="H1000"\w* \w of|strong="H0398"\w* asps, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w have|strong="H0398"\w* \w woven|strong="H0707"\w* \w the|strong="H0398"\w* \w webs|strong="H6980"\w* \w of|strong="H0398"\w* spiders: he \w that|strong="H4191"\w* \w shall|strong="H4191"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w of|strong="H0398"\w* \w their|strong="H0398"\w* \w eggs|strong="H1000"\w*, \w shall|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*: \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w that|strong="H4191"\w* which \w is|strong="H4191"\w* brought \w out|strong="H1234"\w*, \w shall|strong="H4191"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* hatched into \w a|strong="H0398"\w* basilisk.

\w Their|strong="H1961"\w* \w webs|strong="H6980"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w clothing|strong="H0899"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* \w themselves|strong="H0205"\w* \w with|strong="H3680"\w* \w their|strong="H1961"\w* \w works|strong="H4639"\w*: \w their|strong="H1961"\w* \w works|strong="H4639"\w* \w are|strong="H4639"\w* unprofitable \w works|strong="H4639"\w*, \w and|strong="H3709"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w* \w of|strong="H3709"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w* \w is|strong="H4639"\w* \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w their|strong="H1961"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*.

\w Their|strong="H7451"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* \w run|strong="H7323"\w* \w to|strong="H7323"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, \w and|strong="H1818"\w* \w make|strong="H4116"\w* \w haste|strong="H4116"\w* \w to|strong="H7323"\w* \w shed|strong="H8210"\w* \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*: \w their|strong="H7451"\w* \w thoughts|strong="H4284"\w* \w are|strong="H4284"\w* unprofitable \w thoughts|strong="H4284"\w*: wasting \w and|strong="H1818"\w* \w destruction|strong="H7667"\w* \w are|strong="H4284"\w* \w in|strong="H7272"\w* \w their|strong="H7451"\w* \w ways|strong="H4284"\w*.

\w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w known|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \w in|strong="H1870"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* steps: \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w paths|strong="H4570"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* become \w crooked|strong="H6140"\w* \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*, \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H0369"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* treadeth \w in|strong="H1870"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*, knoweth \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \w far|strong="H7368"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w overtake|strong="H5381"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*. \w We|strong="H1980"\w* \w looked|strong="H2009"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w light|strong="H0216"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*: \w brightness|strong="H5054"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w we|strong="H1980"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w dark|strong="H2822"\w*.

\w We|strong="H4191"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* groped \w for|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H4191"\w* \w wall|strong="H7023"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w like|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H4191"\w* \w blind|strong="H5787"\w* \w we|strong="H4191"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* groped as if \w we|strong="H4191"\w* \w had|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*: \w we|strong="H4191"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w stumbled|strong="H3782"\w* \w at|strong="H4191"\w* noonday as \w in|strong="H4191"\w* darkness, \w we|strong="H4191"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w dark|strong="H5399"\w* places as \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* \w men|strong="H5787"\w*.

\w We|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H0369"\w* \w roar|strong="H1993"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w us|strong="H4480"\w* \w like|strong="H1993"\w* \w bears|strong="H1677"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w shall|strong="H0369"\w* lament \w as|strong="H4941"\w* mournful \w doves|strong="H3123"\w*. \w We|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* looked \w for|strong="H4941"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w none|strong="H0369"\w*: \w for|strong="H4941"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w it|strong="H7368"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w far|strong="H7368"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w us|strong="H4480"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w* \w are|strong="H6588"\w* \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w* \w before|strong="H5048"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* testified \w against|strong="H0854"\w* \w us|strong="H3045"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* wicked doings \w are|strong="H6588"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w us|strong="H3045"\w*, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w known|strong="H3045"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w*:

\w In|strong="H0430"\w* sinning \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w lying|strong="H8267"\w* \w against|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H1697"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* turned \w away|strong="H0310"\w* \w so|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w we|strong="H1697"\w* went not \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w but|strong="H1696"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* calumny \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w transgression|strong="H6586"\w*: \w we|strong="H1697"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* \w conceived|strong="H2029"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w uttered|strong="H1696"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w falsehood|strong="H8267"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \w is|strong="H4941"\w* turned \w away|strong="H7350"\w* \w backward|strong="H0268"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w* hath \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w far|strong="H7350"\w* \w off|strong="H7350"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* bath \w fallen|strong="H0935"\w* \w down|strong="H3782"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w street|strong="H7339"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w equity|strong="H6666"\w* \w could|strong="H3201"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* hath \w been|strong="H1961"\w* forgotten: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w departed|strong="H5493"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, \w lay|strong="H1961"\w* open \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* prey: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0376"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*: \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* stood \w astonished|strong="H8074"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w none|strong="H0369"\w* \w to|strong="H0369"\w* oppose \w himself|strong="H1931"\w*: \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* \w own|strong="H0376"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* \w brought|strong="H3467"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3467"\w* \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* \w own|strong="H0376"\w* \w justice|strong="H6666"\w* supported \w him|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3444"\w* \w put|strong="H3847"\w* \w on|strong="H3847"\w* \w justice|strong="H6666"\w* as \w a|strong="H3847"\w* \w breastplate|strong="H8302"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w a|strong="H3847"\w* \w helmet|strong="H3553"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w* \w upon|strong="H3847"\w* \w his|strong="H3847"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*: \w he|strong="H3444"\w* \w put|strong="H3847"\w* \w on|strong="H3847"\w* \w the|strong="H3847"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w vengeance|strong="H5359"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w was|strong="H7218"\w* clad \w with|strong="H3847"\w* \w zeal|strong="H7068"\w* as \w with|strong="H3847"\w* \w a|strong="H3847"\w* cloak.

As unto revenge, as \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w were|strong="H0339"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w repay|strong="H7999"\w* \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* adversaries, \w and|strong="H2534"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w reward|strong="H1578"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*: \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H0339"\w* \w repay|strong="H7999"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w like|strong="H0339"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w islands|strong="H0339"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w west|strong="H4628"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w rising|strong="H4217"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w*, \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*: \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w as|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* violent \w stream|strong="H5104"\w*, \w which|strong="H7307"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* driveth \w on|strong="H0935"\w*:

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w*, \w redeemer|strong="H1350"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* Sion, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w them|strong="H7725"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* iniquity \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w My|strong="H7760"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w depart|strong="H4185"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thy seedâ€™s \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w from|strong="H5921"\w* henceforth \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.
